context_bundle.summary: Linkerd: Lightweight CNCF service mesh. Rust-based proxy (linkerd2-proxy). Key features: zero-config mTLS, automatic retries/timeouts, traffic splitting, tap for debugging, minimal resource footprint, simpler than Istio. No CRDs for basic functionality.

onboarding.quick_start: Linkerd: 1) linkerd install | kubectl apply -f -, 2) linkerd check, 3) kubectl annotate namespace default linkerd.io/inject=enabled, 4) Redeploy apps, 5) linkerd dashboard for visualization.
common_patterns: Inject annotation: linkerd.io/inject: enabled on namespace/deployment
Service profile: define routes, retries, timeouts per service
Traffic split: TrafficSplit CRD for canary deployments
Tap: linkerd tap deploy/myapp for real-time request inspection

known_errors.error: pod has been rejected by linkerd-proxy-injector
known_errors.cause: Pod spec conflicts with injection (hostNetwork, certain security contexts)
known_errors.solution: Add linkerd.io/inject: disabled annotation or fix pod spec
known_errors.prevention: Review Linkerd injection requirements before enabling namespace-wide
